name: Luxurious and Spacious 3 BR private apt near train
neighborhood_overview: The blue line airport T station is around the corner making travel around the city a breeze
description:
My place is close to the Blue line Airport T station, only two stops from downtown Boston. In the immediate neighborhood you will find Shawâ€™s Supermarket, Rinos, Angela's, Oliveira's Restaurant, Roy's Cold Cuts. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets).
Bremen Street Park with it's playground and lawn areas is located directly behind the building and a great place for kids or for a walk with your dog.

The space
The entire condo and back porch are exclusive to you as my guests. The condo is on two levels, level 1 has 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath and the basement level has another large bedroom with another bathroom.

Guest access
We have keyless entry. Codes will be provided after booking so that you can enter the apartment even if you arrive in the middle of the night.
